description: Graph Explorer Configuration for W3C Ontology System

ENDPOINT_URL.description: SPARQL endpoint URL for graph explorer

notes: The graph explorer connects to the Python API by default
The Python API returns results in standard SPARQL JSON format
CORS is enabled on the Python API for browser access
The graph explorer automatically discovers OWL classes and properties
Visualization settings are applied client-side in the browser
To switch to Fuseki, change ENDPOINT_URL in docker-compose.yml
